alert.note: Alert for Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 25 at 2:08AM MDT until June 26 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT MONDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 105 expected. * WHERE...Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Monday. For the third Heat Advisory, from Noon to 7 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
